items.sentence: I think you can probably guess what happened next.
Do you have a pair of wire cutters I could borrow?
The doctors think that Tom might never walk again.
Tom picked the magazine up and started reading it.
Tom said that if I invited Mary, he wouldn't come.
Would you prefer to speak in French or in English?
I've lost three kilograms in the last three weeks.
My father flew into a rage when he found that out.
Perhaps you need to spend some time getting ready.
So far, we've spent almost nothing on advertising.
I've been spending a lot of time at home recently.
You don't have to spend a lot to have a good time.
Are you going to spend the rest of your life here?
Tom and Mary plan to spend time together tomorrow.
You need to spend quality time with your children.
Tom spent a lot of money when he was in Australia.
It would be better if you didn't watch so much TV.
We used to eat a lot of potatoes when I was a kid.
Do you think you could help me solve this problem?
I doubt that Tom would ever be allowed to do that.
